title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions: Indulge your senses with our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set! This set of 16 scented candles is the perfect gift for your Mother, Wife, Daughter, or Friend. Each candle is made with natural soy wax and infused with essential oils for a truly luxurious experience. With fragrances like Jasmine, Rose, and Vanilla, you can create a calming atmosphere anywhere you go. The tin cans are not only recyclable but can also be repurposed as flowerpots or home decorations. Enjoy 18-20 hours of burn time per candle and remember to keep them out of reach of children and pets for safety. Treat yourself or a loved one to this delightful set of scented candles today!
